001package edu.pdx.cs410J.whitlock;
002
003import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;
004import edu.pdx.cs410J.lang.Human;
005
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import java.util.function.Consumer;
008
009/**                                                                                 
010 * This class is represents a <code>Student</code>.                                 
011 */                                                                                 
012public class Student extends Human {
013
014  static final String THEY_PRONOUN = "They";
015  static final String OTHER_GENDER = "other";
016  static final String FEMALE_PRONOUN = "She";
017  static final String MALE_PRONOUN = "He";
018  static final String FEMALE_GENDER = "female";
019  static final String MALE_GENDER = "male";
020  static final String MISSING_COMMAND_LINE_ARGUMENTS = "Missing command line arguments";
021
022  private final String genderPronoun;
023  private final double gpa;
024  private final ArrayList<String> classes;
025
026  /**
027   * Creates a new <code>Student</code>                                             
028   *                                                                                
029   * @param name                                                                    
030   *        The student's name                                                      
031   * @param classes                                                                 
032   *        The names of the classes the student is taking.  A student              
033   *        may take zero or more classes.                                          
034   * @param gpa                                                                     
035   *        The student's grade point average                                       
036   * @param gender                                                                  
037   *        The student's gender ("male", "female", or "other", case-insensitive)
038   */                                                                               
039  public Student(String name, ArrayList<String> classes, double gpa, String gender) {
040    super(name);
041
042    if (name.length() > 40) {
043      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Name is too long");
044    }
045
046    validateGpa(gpa);
047    this.gpa = gpa;
048
049    this.classes = classes;
050
051    this.genderPronoun = getGenderPronoun(gender);
052  }
053
054  private void validateGpa(double gpa) {
055    if (gpa > 4.0) {
056      throw new InvalidGpaException(gpa);
057    }
058
059  }
060
061  public String getGenderPronoun() {
062    return this.genderPronoun;
063  }
064
065  /**                                                                               
066   * All students say "This class is too much work"
067   */
068  @Override
069  public String says() {                                                            
070    throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Not implemented yet");
071  }
072
073  /**                                                                               
074   * Returns a <code>String</code> that describes this                              
075   * <code>Student</code>.                                                          
076   */                                                                               
077  public String toString() {
078    return getName()
079      + " has a gpa of " + this.gpa
080      + " and is taking " + getClassNames()
081      + " " + this.genderPronoun;
082  }
083
084  private String getClassNames() {
085    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
086    this.classes.forEach(className -> sb.append(className).append(" "));
087    return sb.toString();
088  }
089
090  private static String getGenderPronoun(String gender) {
091    if (FEMALE_GENDER.equalsIgnoreCase(gender)) {
092      return FEMALE_PRONOUN;
093
094    } else if (MALE_GENDER.equalsIgnoreCase(gender)) {
095      return MALE_PRONOUN;
096
097    } else if (OTHER_GENDER.equalsIgnoreCase(gender)) {
098      return THEY_PRONOUN;
099    }
100
101    throw new UnrecognizedGenderException("Gender " + gender + " not supported yet");
102  }
103
104  /**
105   * Main program that parses the command line, creates a
106   * <code>Student</code>, and prints a description of the student to
107   * standard out by invoking its <code>toString</code> method.
108   */
109  public static void main(String[] args) {
110    try {
111      Student student = new CommandLineParser(args).createStudent();
112      System.out.println(student);
113      System.exit(0);
114
115    } catch (InvalidGpaException ex) {
116      printErrorMessageAndExit(ex.getInvalidGpa() + " is an invalid gpa");
117
118    } catch (MissingCommandLineArgumentsException ex) {
119      printErrorMessageAndExit(MISSING_COMMAND_LINE_ARGUMENTS);
120    }
121
122  }
123
124  private static void printErrorMessageAndExit(String message) {
125    System.err.println(message);
126    System.exit(1);
127  }
128
129  public static class UnrecognizedGenderException extends RuntimeException {
130    public UnrecognizedGenderException(String message) {
131      super(message);
132    }
133  }
134
135  public static class InvalidGpaException extends RuntimeException {
136    private final String invalidGpa;
137
138    public InvalidGpaException(double invalidGpa) {
139      this(String.valueOf(invalidGpa));
140    }
141
142    public InvalidGpaException(String  invalidGpa) {
143      super("Invalid gpa: " + invalidGpa);
144      this.invalidGpa = invalidGpa;
145    }
146
147    public String getInvalidGpa() {
148      return invalidGpa;
149    }
150
151  }
152
153  public static class MissingCommandLineArgumentsException extends RuntimeException {
154  }
155}
